Resume

Senior Engineering Manager with over 10 years of experience building scalable products and leading high-performing teams.

Download PDF Contact Me

Professional Summary

Experienced Senior Engineering Manager with a proven track record of scaling engineering teams from 5 to 50+ engineers while maintaining high velocity and code quality. Expert in modern web technologies, system architecture, and agile methodologies. Passionate about building inclusive engineering cultures and mentoring the next generation of technical leaders.

Professional Experience

Senior Engineering Manager

2022 - Present

TechCorp Inc. • Nashville, TN

  • • Lead a team of 15+ engineers across multiple product areas, responsible for technical strategy and team growth
  • • Implemented new development processes that improved team velocity by 40% and reduced deployment time by 60%
  • • Architected and oversaw migration to microservices architecture, improving system reliability to 99.9% uptime
  • • Established engineering hiring practices and onboarding programs, growing the team from 8 to 15 engineers
  • • Mentored 5 engineers into senior roles and 2 into technical leadership positions
Team Leadership System Architecture Process Improvement

Tech Lead

2020 - 2022

TechCorp Inc. • Nashville, TN

  • • Designed and implemented new microservices infrastructure using Node.js and Docker
  • • Established coding standards, code review processes, and CI/CD pipelines
  • • Reduced average API response time by 50% through performance optimization initiatives
  • • Mentored junior engineers and conducted technical interviews for new hires
Node.js Docker Microservices Performance Optimization
